title: Top Ranked Income Stocks to Buy for October 2nd
text:
Here are three stocks with buy rank and strong income characteristics for investors to consider today, October 2nd:

AbbVie Inc. (ABBV): This developer and seller of pharmaceutical products has witnessed the Zacks Consensus Estimate for its current year earnings increasing 1% over the last 60 days.
